title: Design Mine Haul Road
description: A mine planning engineer designs a new haul road to access a lower phase of the open pit.

tasks.description: Define the start and end points of the new haul road on the mine plan.
Design the road's alignment, ensuring the gradient does not exceed the maximum allowed for the haul trucks (e.g., 10%).
tasks.expected_outcome: A safe and efficient road alignment is designed.

tasks.description: Generate the final design, including cut and fill volumes needed to construct the road.
tasks.expected_outcome: A complete road design package is created for the construction team.
